snippet: Results of voting at Burberry’s annual general meeting Friday showed that 52.7 percent of shareholders protested the earnings Christopher Bailey is expected to receive.
lead_paragraph: Results of voting at Burberry’s annual general meeting Friday showed that 52.7 percent of shareholders protested the earnings Christopher Bailey is expected to receive.

headline.main: Burberry Shareholders Reject Chief’s Pay Package
headline.print_headline: Burberry Shareholders Reject Chief’s Pay Package
